Frontend Data

Datavisualization of the parking spaces that will have conflict with the current COVID_19 restrictions, made with D3.js. Based on RDW-data, cleaned beforehand.

Description

Using datasets from the Dutch RDW, the opening times of parking spaces/garages are compared to the enforcing of a (Covid)Curfew. Researched what spaces would have conflicting times and will create possible problems. Data was fetched, cleaned, filtered and then turned into an interactive d3.js-visualization which compares what cities have the most conflicting spaces.

Technologies

Used technologies

  • HTML
  • Semantics
  • CSS
  • Client-side
  • JavaScript
  • Server-side

  • Node.js
